changeSet.author: awallace
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.FLUVIAL_NON_DISPLAY_GROUP_WORKFLOW', 'U') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.FLUVIAL_NON_DISPLAY_GROUP_WORKFLOW', 'NON_DISPLAY_GROUP_WORKFLOW';

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.NON_DISPLAY_GROUP_WORKFLOW', 'U') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.NON_DISPLAY_GROUP_WORKFLOW', 'FLUVIAL_NON_DISPLAY_GROUP_WORKFLOW';
